channel.title: Medical Seating – Medika Supplies
channel.description: Supply quality products to the medical industries

item.title: Community Lounge Chairs
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
Ideal for all bedside and communal locations in the NHS, nursing homes and residential care environments. Inter changeable seat cushions accommodate medium to high risk patients without changing the seat height. The option of an ergonomically positioned hand bar and optional housekeeping castors allow the chair to be easily moved. The elegant simple design features a fixed back seat angle and is available with high tech durable upholstery. Available with a safe working load upgrade to 225Kg (35 stone).  

Models Available

For all the Lavenham, Ashfield and Rushmere models see price list for full range   Features •   Ideal for all bedside requirements in NHS and care home environments •   Various waterproof and anti-bacterial vinyl and fabric options available •   Interchangeable seat cushions •   Easy to wipe clean •   Anti-bacterial lacquered wooden frames •   Strong and durable wooden design •   Fire retardant to BS 5852 (Crib 5) Optional Accessories •   A range of colours available •   A wide choice of vinyl’s, fabrics and colours •   6 wooden finishes available •   Pressure relief seat cushions •   Seat heights of 41cm and 46cm are also available

item.title: General Care Chairs
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
This hard wearing range of patient chairs is FIRA tested to severe contract standard for strength and stability. Wooden frames are stained and polished to severe contract standard using antibacterial lacquer. Upholstery is designed to minimise seams and stapling. Seat cushions are reversible for product longevity with pressure relief seat foam available as an option.  

Models Available

For all the Brightwell, Elmswell and Bromley models - see price list for full range   Features •   Ideal for all bedside requirements in NHS and nursing home environments •   Various waterproof and anti-bacterial vinyl and fabric options available •   Removable and reversible seat cushions •   Easy to clean and wipe-able •   Anti-bacterial lacquered wooden frames •   Strong and durable wooden design •   Fire retardant to BS 5852 (Crib 5) Optional Accessories • A range of colours available • A wide choice of vinyl’s, fabrics and colours • 6 wooden finishes available • Drop down arm supports • Pressure relief seat cushions • Seat heights of 41cm and 46cm are also available • Housekeeping castors for easy transportation

item.title: SEERS Contoured Medical Chair
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
A versatile chair with a contoured seat pad and raised front to promote positive posture whilst seated. The 3 lever mechanism provides independent positioning of the backrest angle, seat pad tilt and chair height. The contoured backrest is ergonomically designed to provide lumbar support for the operator and has the option of foot height control.  

Models Available

MC7212 - Contoured medical chair - standard model - Height range 45cm to 59cm MC7213 - Contoured medical chair - high model - Height range 54cm to 74cm - Foot support ring fitted as standard.

item.title: SEERS Deluxe Saddle Chairs
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: The Deluxe Saddle Chairs are commonly used in Sonography, Dentistry and Surgical environments. The ergonomic design promotes positive posture by encouraging pelvic tilt whilst the user straddles the stool with both feet firmly on the floor and body weight is distributed through the thighs. The 2 lever mechanism operates and adjusts the seat height and tilt. All models feature a polished aluminium five star base and castors, with option of foot height control. An optional matching back support is also available if required.   Models Available MC6107 - Deluxe saddle chair - standard model - Height range 48cm to 59cm. MC6108 - Deluxe saddle chair - high model - Height range 55cm to 75cm. MC9123 - Matching back support.

item.title: SEERS Dual Curve Medical Stool
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
The dual curve medical stools feature an ergonomically designed seat pad, the curvature and static tilt of the seat encourages pelvic tilt, prevents slouching and promotes positive posture. An ideal suturing stool for clinical environments such as Delivery Suites, Theatres and A&E Departments, where the clinician is required to work in close proximity to the patient during these procedures. The foot height control option provides hands free height adjustment during these procedures.  

Models Available

MC6168 - Dual curve medical stool - standard model - Height range 45cm to 59cm. MC6169 - Dual curve medical stool - high model -Height range 54cm to 74cm - Foot support ring fitted as standard.

item.title: SEERS Fixed Height Phlebotomy Chair
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
The fixed height phlebotomy chair is a high quality blood sampling chair with multi-directional armrests. A practical and easy to use chair for busy clinical environments. The fixed height chair has a static seat height at 45cm. Integral arm supports on each side assist the patient in mounting and dismounting the chair. These models are available with a choice of single or dual phlebotomy armrests.  

SEERS Fixed Height Phlebotomy Chair

Models MC6156 Fixed height phlebotomy chair with single adjustable armrest. MC6157 Fixed height phlebotomy chair with dual adjustable armrests.

item.title: SEERS Hydraulic Phlebotomy Chair
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
The hydraulic height adjustable phlebotomy chair enables the operator to easily and accurately position the patient for blood sampling procedures. The chair is a compact and space saving alternative to electrically operated chairs and couches. Supplied with a sturdy base on glides (static feet) or with several castor options. Integral arm supports are fitted as standard to assist the patient in mounting and dismounting the chair. The chair has a height range of 49cm to 63cm. These models are available with a choice of single or dual phlebotomy armrests.  

SEERS Hydraulic Phlebotomy Chair

Models MC6154 Hydraulic phlebotomy chair with single adjustable armrest. MC6155 Hydraulic phlebotomy chair with dual adjustable armrests.

item.title: SEERS Multi Procedures Chair
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
Ideally suited for Operating Suites, Ultrasound, Dentistry and Ophthalmic Departments. The 360° swing around arm provides the clinician with an armrest or torso support, using a single movement and offering additional stability during procedures. The ratchet system allows the armrest to be adjusted towards or away from the clinician, providing the user with a variety of options for different procedures. The height of the arm can also be adjusted, ideal if it is being used to support the torso. The backrest models provide additional support and comfort. All models are available with a foot height control as an option.  

Models Available

MC6160 Chair with 360° swing around arm with backrest - standard model - Height range 45cm to 59cm. MC6161 Chair with 360° swing around arm with backrest - high model - Height range 54cm to 74cm - Foot support ring fitted as standard. MC6162 Chair with 360° swing around arm - Standard model - Height range 45cm to 59cm. MC6163 Chair with 360° swing around arm - High model -Height range 54cm to 74cm - Foot support ring fitted as standard

item.title: SEERS Ophthalmology Chair
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
The chair has a low seat height for patient mount and dismount and the hydraulic height adjustment enables the clinician to alter the position of the seated patient to the desired height before carrying out procedures and examinations. The arms provide maximum support for the patient as they mount and dismount the chair. The swivel action of the chair can be locked for the patients safety during examinations. The fully adjustable headrest can also be removed for certain procedures.  

Models Available

MC6172 Ophthalmology chair with headrest

item.title: SEERS Round Medical Stools
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: The clinical stool range has been designed to offer the clinician a variety of seat options, promoting optimum posture during various procedures. The stools are suitable for use in a wide range of clinical environments. The standard model provides a height range of 45cm to 59cm and the high model provides a height range of 54cm to 74cm. High models are supplied with an adjustable foot support ring as standard. The foot height control options provides hands free height adjustment.   Models Available MC6164 - Round medical stool - standard model - Height range 45cm to 59cm. MC6165 - Round medical stool - high model - Height range 54cm to 74cm - Foot support ring fitted as standard.
